an3.119:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti …pe… samphappalāpī hoti.
an3.119:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchāājīvo hoti, micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti.
an3.119:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchādiṭṭhiko hoti viparītadassano:
an3.119:3.3: ‘natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ …pe… ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti.
an3.119:4.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti …pe… samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti.
an3.119:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammāājīvo hoti, sammāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti.
an3.119:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammādiṭṭhiko hoti aviparītadassano:
an3.119:6.3: ‘atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭhaṃ …pe… ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti.
